name: San Francisco Getaway
description: A short but eventful trip exploring the iconic sights and culture of San Francisco.

days.name: Day 1: Arrival and Golden Gate
days.description: Arrive in San Francisco and visit the world-famous Golden Gate Bridge.

stops.name: Golden Gate Bridge
stops.description: Walk across the Golden Gate Bridge and enjoy stunning views of the bay.

days.name: Day 2: Alcatraz and Fisherman's Wharf
days.description: Explore Alcatraz Island in the morning and enjoy the bustling Fisherman's Wharf in the afternoon.

stops.name: Alcatraz Island
stops.description: Take a ferry to Alcatraz and tour the historic prison.

stops.name: Fisherman's Wharf
stops.description: Enjoy fresh seafood, shopping, and street performances at Fisherman's Wharf.

days.name: Day 3: Chinatown and Lombard Street
days.description: Discover San Francisco's vibrant Chinatown and the famous Lombard Street.

stops.name: Chinatown
stops.description: Wander through Chinatown and enjoy its unique shops and eateries.

stops.name: Lombard Street
stops.description: Take photos of and walk down the famously crooked street.

days.name: Day 4: Departure
days.description: Wrap up the trip with a leisurely morning before departing San Francisco.

stops.name: Union Square
stops.description: Enjoy a relaxed morning with coffee and shopping in Union Square.
